extendedInfo.description: Sends any message you compose to every destination you specify, all with a single click.To use:1.  Enter the text messages you send most often.2.  Specify the destinations.3.  Tap the message to send it.This trial version allows you to send 20 messages before expiring, so you can try it out and see whether you like it.Common uses: - Let your wife/husband know you are leaving work and heading home. - Invite several friends to an event.https://sites.google.com/site/etoyocenol

reviews.title: Love this app..
reviews.comment: Easy UI..  love the folder feature.  If you have common texts you send you will love this.  Getting force closes every once in a while on my Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Paul Randall

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Finally I\'ve been waiting for this like forever!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
